thread.title: "Smooth Criminal" Played on a Bamboo Flute, Koto

author: Travis Oscarson
title: "Smooth Criminal" Played on a Bamboo Flute, Koto
text:
Weather Back "Smooth Criminal" Played on a Bamboo Flute, Koto A Twist on a Michael Jackson Classic Travis Oscarson 1:03 PM, Oct 21, 2015 Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. Show Caption Previous Next 
It’s easy to see why Michael Jackson will always be the King of pop as his popularity remains strong even till today, years after his passing. MJ had countless hits and one that can easily be among the most famous ones is “Smooth Criminal”. Japanese musician Yoshimi Tsujimoto performed the timeless song using a traditional Japanese bamboo flute. 
"Smooth Criminal" Played on a Bamboo Flute, Koto" is #trendingUp and you can see the entire video now, on The List! Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
